alert.note: Alert for Central Cook; DuPage; Kane; Lake; McHenry; Northern Cook (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 11:59PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lake, northern Kane, eastern McHenry, northern DuPage and northern Cook Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1157 PM CDT, strong thunderstorm outflow winds along a line extending from near Channel Lake to Crystal Lake to near Hampshire. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Mesonet Site. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chicago, Elgin, Waukegan, Arlington Heights, Evanston, Schaumburg, Palatine, Skokie, Des Plaines, Mount Prospect, Wheaton, Hoffman Estates, Downers Grove, Glenview, Elmhurst, Lombard, Buffalo Grove, Bartlett, Crystal Lake and Ohare Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Cook; DuPage; Kane; Lake; McHenry; Northern Cook
